title: Consider if `unevaluatedProperties:true/{}` is necessary
description: While `unevaluatedProperties:true` (or `{}`) may appear redundant, removing it can change schema behavior in some contexts. Verify it's safe to remove before doing so.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Wrong: Redundant unevaluatedProperties:true
comprehensiveExamples.description: Explicit `true` is often redundant; ensure removing it does not change evaluated behavior.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Wrong: Redundant unevaluatedProperties:{} in nested arrays
comprehensiveExamples.description: Avoid sprinkling empty subschemas that don't change validation.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Right: Constraining unevaluatedProperties
comprehensiveExamples.description: It is valid to explicitly allow extra keys with a subschema when needed.

message: Verify if `unevaluatedProperties` can be safely removed.
